course_title: Neonatal Nurse Practitioner Clinical Practicum I
course_description: This course will provide a clinical practice preceptorship with faculty oversight to develop skills in health assessment and physical exam, differential diagnosis, diagnostic reasoning and plan of care for neonates and infants/toddlers in low to moderate risk settings (Level II-III).
prerequisites: NRSG 528 and NRSG 554 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
sections: Class Nbr: 3922, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
